content:
# I have successfully crafted one stone furnace, and my inventory now shows:
# - 2 Stone Furnaces (indicating I crafted one and had one already)
# - 10 Coal
# - 10 Iron Ore
#
# Now that I have the stone furnace, I can proceed to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. 

# First, I will place the stone furnace in a suitable location. 
# I will move to a position where I can place the furnace, ensuring it is close to my inventory for easy access.

# Let's place the stone furnace at my current position.
furnace_position = Position(x=-16.0, y=26.0)  # Using the current position for placing the furnace.
move_to(furnace_position)  # Move to the position to place the furnace.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Placing the stone furnace.
